title: [LFM] PLAT V TEAM - must be PLAT V min/use Skype! Jg/adc
body:
**CURRENTLY RECRUITING JUNGLE**

---

**Requirements: **
- Current soloq level of Plat V or higher
- Skype for communication
- Able to play at least once a week

**Details:
**
Most of us in timezone GMT +10. We play Fri-Sun (or when time allows during the weekday) and hope to improve and climb together as a team.
We also update tables of statistics/strats and once in a while, a YouTube clip of highlights/fails and gameplay. This is all done by our support. Two of us are unable to speak in Skype for reasons, but it's preferred if you are able to communicate and any shot-calling ability is a plus too.

Add me IG if interested: **Opia**

Thanks, have a good day. :)

replies.body: Iam GOLD 1 and climbing plat soon ! I playing on smurf account ! May i join?

Opia add me I am a diamond 5 mid lane main 

seethingsin

> [{quoted}](name=Jouska,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=sKP3fham,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-19T05:36:00.940+0000)
>
> wow such a {{summoner:4}} -y post!

I will bench you lmao.
then i can just play Tahm Bench ayy
Would you accept a Gold V that mains top and adc? Dying to be in a 5v5 team. If i have a beast support, I always win lane. And I win Top aswell

Sorry Xiaoma, your rating has to be at least Plat V. I'm sure there are other 5s teams that'll be happy to accept you though.
Good luck!
No worries man! I can't find any teams it is so hard! You could of searched up my ranked stats. I think they are pretty good. But thanks for the feedback! Hope you get what you want and goodluck!
You could start your own team but don't worry - keep looking! There's teams recruiting of gold elo too. Sorry again and good luck to you too. :)
